question: Hi,I am 33yrs old I have diabetes since 7 yrs my hba1c is around between 7 to 8, since 1 year i have problem in right stomach i have pain in right lower abdomen, right testicle and right leg...  I have shown it to many doctors I have taken X-ray and scanning but report says normal... can any one help me. title: pain in right lower abdomen, right testicle and right leg
